TopicTitle: Connecting Crafts in VAB doesn't work

Articles.Content:
So since 1.10 rolled arround I've been experiencing this issue that the "connect" button in the VAB load dialogue doesn't work, I've previously tried it without any mods but the issue persits.

Steps to recreate: Load or build craft 1; open the load menu and click connect

Versions: KSP 1.10.0.2917 64 bit

Mods:

MechJeb 2 (V.2.10.0.0)

Module Manager (V 4.1.3)

Logs (I doubt they help but I can still give it a shot)

https://www.dropbox.com/s/t5k8n2xlts6kvvr/Player.log?dl=0

I've also seen a lot of People complaining on Reddit and Twitter so I doubt I'm the only one, maybe there is a common solution?
Maybe you mean this confirmed bug? https://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/25666
